title: Evaluate and migrate frontend from Gatsby to Vite + React
description: Current build uses Gatsby but all data is fetched at runtimeâ€”Gatsby's static/GraphQL benefits are unused. Migrate to Vite + React for simpler builds, faster dev experience, and better fit for this dashboard app. Also fix pathPrefix for Render deployment (use GATSBY_PATH_PREFIX=/ for root).

title: Max fetch for YouTrack project issues capped at 100
description: The max fetch limit for YouTrack project issues appears to be hardcoded or capped at 100, but this is not the correct value. Need to investigate and fix the limit.
